title: ezhundaruL tirumaghaLE
sahitya:
ezhundaruL tirumaghaLE enakkirangi.


anupallavi

  kozhundoLir kuNDali shakti bhavAni kurunaghai selviyE kOmaLavalliyE


caraNam    tAzhvum sirumaiyum dariddiramum vilaga dhana ghana bhAgyam tazhaittu nilavavE
vAzhvellAm Ananda vara kaviyAghavE mangala samayOgam engum viLangavE
